$max_sessions_per_username_desc.en: Maximum concurrent sessions allowed for one username.
$max_sessions_per_username_desc.zh: 单个用户名允许的并发会话上限。

$username_white_list_desc.zh: 不参与配额校验的用户名。

$snapshot_request_timeout_ms_desc.en: Timeout budget for list API snapshot requests.
